item.title: How Google Workspace just made it easier for others to pronounce your name
item.description: Your Google profile card can now hold a recording of your name. The new feature is available to users with certain Workspace accounts.

item.title: The best Android phones to buy in 2023: Tested and reviewed
item.description: ZDNET tested just about every major Android phone release this year and rounded up the top picks, including ones for budget shoppers, foldable enthusiasts, and more.

item.title: The 90+ best holiday gaming laptop deals
item.description: Miss out on Black Friday and Cyber Monday sales? With the holiday shopping season going full tilt, you can still find awesome deals on gaming laptops from HP, Alienware, MSI, and more.

item.title: How Opera's AI bot beats Google at its own game
item.description: Finally, a reason to love AI! I now use Opera's Aria feature in place of Google searches. Here's why that works so well.

item.title: The 40+ best holiday 2023 gaming PC deals
item.description: The holiday shopping season is here, and you can save up to $1,350 on gaming desktops from MSI, Alienware, Corsair and more right now.

item.title: The 65+ best holiday TV deals
item.description: The holiday shopping season is in full-swing, and now is the time to find great deals on TVs from brands like Sony, LG, Samsung, TCL, and more at Amazon, Best Buy, Walmart, and other retailers.

item.title: The best over-ear headphones: Expert tested and reviewed
item.description: Choosing the best over-ear headphones can be a challenge. Here's how to find the right pair for you, based on ZDNET's testing.

item.title: Don't diss the pigeons: How nature's algorithm rivals AI
item.description: The unassuming pigeon might not be held in high regard, but there are ways in which the pigeon makes decisions that will impress even its most ardent critics.

item.title: How to use DALL-E 3 in ChatGPT
item.description: If you've been waiting for the moment when ChatGPT can generate images for you, this is it.

item.title: Buy a one-year Costco membership for $20 right now
item.description: If you buy a Costco membership for $60 right now, you'll get a $40 gift card to use in the store or online with this deal, so you can save on everything from holiday gifts to groceries.

item.title: The best NAS devices of 2023
item.description: The best NAS storage devices feature user-friendly interfaces, fast performance, and excellent app availability.

item.title: The 45 best holiday phone deals: iPhone 15, Google Pixel 8 Pro, Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 5
item.description: Buying a new phone this holiday season? ZDNET has rounded up the best deals on iPhones, Samsung Galaxy, Google Pixel, and more.

item.title: I tested the world's first robot vacuum with twin motors for extra suction power, and they actually work
item.description: The Eufy X8 Pro vacuumed my tiled floors incredibly well, but you should buy the robot vacuum for this reason especially.

item.title: Best VPN for streaming in 2023
item.description: The best VPNs for streaming can unblock popular services like Netflix, Disney+, and Hulu, from anywhere in the world. Here are ZDNET's top picks.

item.title: The 25 best holiday Sam's Club deals: Samsung, Fitbit, Lenovo, Garmin, and more
item.description: ZDNET is gathering the best holiday deals on TVs, headphones, monitors, speakers, fridges, and more so you can save more and search less at Sam's Club.

item.title: Generative AI can save marketers 5 hours weekly, as research finds productivity gains for the future
item.description: Generative AI adoption in marketing reveals promising productivity dividends ahead. Marketers estimate generative AI can save them the equivalent of over a month per year, making room for more meaningful work.

item.title: The 23 best holiday Dell deals at Best Buy, Amazon, Newegg, and more
item.description: If you're looking for a monitor to upgrade your work setup or a reliable laptop to work on the go, you can't go wrong with Dell, especially with these deals just in time for the holidays.

item.title: Apple releases iOS 17.2 with Journal app, iPhone 15 Pro perks, and more
item.description: iPhone 15 Pro users will get spatial video recording, faster telephoto focusing, and a new Action Button option, but there are goodies aplenty for everyone.

item.title: Google unveils a search trend time capsule tool to make you feel old
item.description: Just by answering a quick six questions, you can find out which year your favorites belong to.

item.title: The iPhone 15 Pro can officially capture spatial video for the Apple Vision Pro
item.description: The ability to record spatial video for the Apple Vision Pro is now out of beta and generally available through iOS 17.2 on iPhone 15 Pro. Here's how to enable it.
